title: The world 's fastest growing retailers in 2018 , based on retail revenue CAGR
summary: The world 's Retailers in the growing retailers was Vipshop_Holdings_Limited , who made 55.8 2013-2018 .
The most 's Retailers was A101_Yeni_Mağazacılık_A.S , with just 23.8 2013-2018 .

In second place was Retailers Wayfair_Inc. with 49.2 2013-2018 ; third place went to Retailers Reliance_Industries_Limited/Reliance_Retail with 55.8 2013-2018 ; fourth place went to Retailers Dollar_Tree_Inc. with 23.8 2013-2018 and fifth place went to Retailers JD.com_Inc. , who was 44.1 2013-2018 .
gold: This statistic shows the world 's fastest growing retailers in 2018 , based on retail revenue compound annual growth rate from FY 2013 to 2018 . Reliance Industries Limited/Reliance Retail was the world 's fastest growing retailer in that period , with a retail revenue CAGR of 55.8 percent . The company had retail revenues of 18.5 billion U.S. dollars that year .
